column5: Looks like there may not be a game 5 for you to go down to Joe Louis......you would have loved it there

GO HABS GO.A new canadian poll said Canadiens chose the Montreal Canadians as their favorite hockey team with 40% of the vote ,leafs had 24% of the vote.  Its been a while since we have seen the CUP in canada.Its time to bring it home.
You can visit the cup anytime you like, it's in Toronto.
Being born after 1967 Brian this is the only way you will ever see it .  I have seen it there and I saw it here in Montreal during the Stanley cup Parade not the stupid riot.

I KNOW!!! I am hoping that Colorado wins tomorrow night!! Mind you, I hope its a high scoring game like 7-6 with the Avalanche coming out on top! I have COL and DET players in my playoff pools!  I dont think whoever was laughing at me for being in 33rd place in the OFC Playoff Pool is laughing anymore though. Sitting at #7. Not a bad turn around 33rd to 7th.  GO WINGS GO (after tomorrow night!)  Either way though, I am going to a game. If I cant go this weekend, I am getting tickets for the Conference Finals (hopefully)
Yes very nice Stoty.... I beat you though... I went from 42nd to 4th as of last night... WOO HOO!!!!  I do hope that Colorado wins for you though so you can enjoy the game Saturday!!!
Wow, thats a pretty decent jump too! Now, lets hope that you and I can jump to #1 & #2! lol  Thanks, I am really pumped to see my 1st playoff game!
Stoty, I'll have a couple tix for you here in Pittsburgh in a couple weeks.
